help: Get news from up to 70 sources. Just say, get headlines from, and your desired source
genericReprompt: Sorry, I didn't get that, can you repeat that?
getHeadlinesEnd: Ask for more news, or ask for headline 1, 2 or 3 to get more detail
newsSourceSlotElicit: Where would you like to get news from?
sourceDoesntExist: Sorry, I didn't recognise the source, can you repeat it?
problemReadingArticle: Sorry, there was a problem reading the article. I've sent a card to your device with the link to the article
